    • receivedMessage

      public void receivedMessage​(Message message)
      Called when the server receive a message from a client
      Parameters:
      message - message received

    • sendToClient

      public void sendToClient​(Message message)
      Sends a message to one client or to all clients in a match, depending on Message.getUsername() or Message.getUUID() values. Priority is given to Message.getUUID(), if it is null then Message.getUsername() will be used. If one of these values is set to "ALL" (still considering the priority), the message will be sent to all the clients in the match specified by Message.getMatchID()
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent

    • sendToClientExcept

      public void sendToClientExcept​(Message message, java.lang.Integer matchID, java.util.List<java.lang.String> uuidExcept)
      Sends a message to all clients in a match except for those whose UUID is in the uuidExcept parameter
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent
      matchID - matchID corresponding to the desired clients
      uuidExcept - List of UUIDs corresponding to the clients to whom not to send the message

      private void startHeartbeat()

      Associates a client to a UUID
      Parameters:

      client - ClientHandler corresponding to the UUID

    • disconnectAllPlayers

      private void disconnectAllPlayers​(java.lang.Integer matchID, java.lang.String details)
      Disconnect all the players in the match corresponding to the matchID parameter. If matchID is null, all players in the lobby will be disconnected
      Parameters:
      matchID -
      details - details about the disconnection. Will be sent to the clients

    • disconnectPlayers

      private void disconnectPlayers​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersUUID, java.lang.String details)
      Disconnects one or more players and notify those with a message
      Parameters:
      playersUUID - List of UUID corresponding to the players to disconnect
      details - details to send to disconnected players (e.g.: reason about server-side disconnection)

    • cleanMatch

      private boolean cleanMatch​(int matchID)
      Check if the match/lobby contains users and if not cleans/empties it
      Parameters:
      matchID - matchID corresponding to the match to be cleaned. 0 to clean the lobby
      Returns:
      true if the match/lobby has been removed/emptied

    • removeUserSilently

      public void removeUserSilently​(java.lang.String name)
      Removes a user without disconnecting other users
      Parameters:
      name - username of the user to remove

    • restoreMatch

      protected void restoreMatch​(int matchID, VirtualView virtualView, java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames)
      Restores a broken match
      Parameters:
      matchID - ID of the broken match
      virtualView - VirtualView corresponding to this match
      usernames - list of usernames of the players in the match

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String details)
      Disconnects a player and notify him with a message
      Parameters:
      username - username of to the player to disconnect
      details - details to send to disconnected player (e.g.: player has lost)

    • validateIntInput

      private static int validateIntInput​(java.util.Scanner stdin, int minValue, int maxValue)
      Manages the insertion of an integer on command line input, asking it again until it not a valid value.
      Parameters:
      stdin - is the input scanner
      minValue - is the minimum acceptable value of the input
      maxValue - is the maximum acceptable value of the input
      Returns:
      the value of the input
